price: 30. Il y a certes là des Signes et Nous ne faisons que mettre (les hommes) à l’épreuve.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
